title: Building Editor: Gazebo crash after deleting building

content.raw:
1. Enter Building Editor and create a few walls

2. Save & Exit - building appears on main window. Clicking on building doesn't highlight its name on the world tree, but clicking on name on world tree highlights building.

3. Right-click model name (`Untitled`) on world tree and choose delete, the building disappears.

4. Enter the Building Editor again and try to start a wall, Gazebo crashes with

~~~
***** Internal Program Error - assertion (this->dataPtr->sceneNode) failed in void gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetPosition(const gazebo::math::Vector3&):
/home/louise/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc(1548): Visual SceneNode is NULL
~~~
content.html:
1. Enter Building Editor and create a few walls

  2. Save & Exit - building appears on main window. Clicking on building doesn't highlight its name on the world tree, but clicking on name on world tree highlights building.

  3. Right-click model name (Untitled) on world tree and choose delete, the building disappears.

  4. Enter the Building Editor again and try to start a wall, Gazebo crashes with

***** Internal Program Error - assertion (this->dataPtr->sceneNode) failed in void gazebo::rendering::Visual::SetPosition(const gazebo::math::Vector3&):
/home/louise/gazebo_source/gazebo/gazebo/rendering/Visual.cc(1548): Visual SceneNode is NULL
